tool_description: Measures canvas weave density, thread patterns, and fabric characteristics to provide data for dating, provenance research, and authenticity assessment.

measurement_areas.description: Canvas areas to measure (center, edges, corners)

thread_directions.description: Thread directions to count (warp, weft, both)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Non-canvas artwork: This tool is only applicable to canvas-based artworks.
Empty measurement areas: Must specify at least one area of canvas to measure.
Invalid thread direction: Use warp, weft, or both for thread counting directions.
Canvas not accessible: Canvas weave not visible or accessible for measurement.
usage: Specify canvas artwork and measurement locations. Tool counts thread density and analyzes weave patterns to provide dating and provenance information.

thread_density_warp.description: Threads per centimeter in warp direction

thread_density_weft.description: Threads per centimeter in weft direction

historical_context.description: Historical information about this type of canvas
